title: Ambulances & Pick-ups for regional hospitals
content: The Ministry of Health on Thursday (17) handed over 25 modern Ambulances and 38 Pickup trucks to Hospitals and Regional Health Medical Officerâ€™s island wild to improve the quality of Health Services in the Country. From Friday (18) onwards, 25 modern Ambulances donated by the Ministry of Finance to the Ministry of Health will be added to the Sri Lankan Health Service at a cost of around Rs. 15 million per Ambulance. These Ambulances were donated to hospitals in several parts of the country, including remote areas.
